Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Based on the pseudo-BPMN representation of the multinational smartphone supply chain process,

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: here are 20 open-ended, thought-provoking questions that aim to delve deeper into various aspects of the process flows, potential improvements, risk management, decision-making, stakeholder communication, and performance measurement:

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 1. How does the company conduct market research to identify consumer preferences and trends that influence the R&D design process for the smartphone prototype? 2. What criteria does the R&D team use to decide on the specific components for the smartphone prototype...? 3. What are the main risks associated with sourcing components from multiple countries...? ... 19. What are the environmental sustainability practices implemented within this global supply chain process...? 20. How does the company adapt its supply chain process in response to geopolitical events...?
